children.name: Organic
children.description: Food and drinks produced by methods complying with the standards of organic farming. Standards vary worldwise, but organic farming features practices that cylce resources, promote ecological balance, and conserve biodiversity

children.name: Fair Trade
children.description: A trading partnership based on dialogue, transparency and respect, that seeks greater equity in international trade

children.name: Production Method
children.description: Specific practices adhered to during the manufacture and/or production of goods

children.name: Handmade
children.description: Products made by skillful handiwork and simple, non-automated tools

children.name: Ingredients and Dietary
children.description: Products that meet the ingredient requirements for specific dietary restrictions or additive (non-additive) preferences

children.name: Gluten-Free
children.description: Products without gluten

children.name: Sugar-Free
children.description: Products without sugar

children.name: Dairy-Free
children.description: Products without dairy

children.name: Palm-Oil Free
children.description: Products without palm-oil

children.name: Uncategorized
children.description: Label has yet to be categorized
